id.description: The unique identifier of the telephony station.

name.description: The name of the telephony station.

descriptions.description: The description of the telephony station.

status.description: The status of the telephony station.

userId.description: The user ID associated with the telephony station.

webRtcUserId.description: The user ID associated with WebRTC on the telephony station.

primaryEdge.description: The primary edge telephony station used for communication.

id.description: The unique identifier of the primary edge associated with the telephony station.

name.description: The name of the primary edge associated with the telephony station.

selfUri.description: The self URI of the primary edge associated with the telephony station.

secondaryEdge.description: The secondary edge telephony station used for communication.

id.description: The unique identifier of the secondary edge associated with the telephony station.

name.description: The name of the secondary edge associated with the telephony station.

selfUri.description: The self URI of the secondary edge associated with the telephony station.

type.description: The type of the telephony station.

lineAppearanceId.description: The ID representing the line appearance on the telephony station.

webRtcMediaDscp.description: The media DSCP (Differentiated Services Code Point) value for WebRTC on the telephony station.

webRtcPersistentEnabled.description: Flag indicating if WebRTC persistence is enabled on the telephony station.

webRtcForceTurn.description: Flag indicating if force TURN is enabled for WebRTC on the telephony station.

webRtcCallAppearances.description: The call appearances related to WebRTC for the telephony station.

selfUri.description: The self URI of the telephony station.
